idea-plugin.name: Solarized Theme
idea-plugin.description: Adds Solarized Dark and Light themes https://ethanschoonover.com/solarized/
idea-plugin.change-notes:
• 3.0.1 Fixes for crashes and major color fixes:

    Resolves a major crash issue by removing part of the theme. There is a bug filed on the Jetbrains page for this issue. JBR-7981

    Resolves a bunch of filed bugs

    • Toggle button's selected state is indistinguishable #33
    • Error Description is dark when using Solarized Light #34
    • PyCharm freezes on method generation #35
    • Secondary text in code completions pop-up is not readable when selected #36
    • Incorrect code colors in light theme #37
  • 3.0.0 Modifications to align with more modern style:

    Due to requests from several members of the community and with the work of Simon Gamma Solarized Theme now aligns more closely with other editors with the Solarized theme.

    Some of these changes require new features only found in IntelliJ Platform 2019.2, so this is a major release

    • dark panel backgrounds
    • clearer tabs: selected, hovered, etc
    • Material UI underline for selected tabs in panels
    • update build to newer IntelliJ build to support new features
  • 2.1.0 Complete overhaul:
    • updated file colors
    • updated masking colors for editor tabs
    • fixed shading
    • fixed scrollbar colors
    • fixed differences in light and dark themes
    • updated to SemVer versioning
    • unbundle plugin screenshots
  • 2.0 Major incompatibility between 2018.3 - 2019.1 versions. I was building on 2018.3 by accident.
  • 1.2 Fix VCS colors
  • 1.1 Change support to only 2019.1+ products. Change support to all JetBrains products
  • 1.0 Initial release. Basic theme functionality.
